data.thought: S51|H|S47|Domain Phenotype: Product Dev - 'Feature Impact Simulator'. Input: proposed feature spec. Process: (1) Parses spec into requirements (2) Thoughtbox reasons about user impact (3) Generates mock implementations in container (4) Simulates user flows (5) Predicts metrics changes (6) Identifies edge cases. Observable: user journey maps, metric predictions, risk assessment. Swarm: multiple notebooks simulate different user personas. Output: impact report + go/no-go recommendation. Enables: data-driven product decisions before building.
